author: gdaniels
msg: Fix serious bug - we were, for some reason, caching Transports in a
static Hashtable, so multiple threads using the Call object would end up
sharing them, therefore stomping on each other's transport-specific
In fact, sharing transports should be controllable - sometimes even for
the same address you don't want this!  But this fixes a bug for now:
Thanks to Alan Moore for the bug report!
